grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 継承【ケイショウ】inheritance, succession, accession, share-alike
承継【ショウケイ】succession, accession, inheritance
kun reading compounds: 継ぐ【つぐ】to succeed (a person, to a position, etc.), to inherit, to take over, to follow, to patch (clothes), to mend, to repair, to add (e.g. charcoal to the fire), to replenish with, to feed with, to follow up with (e.g. remarks), to gather (one's breath)
